subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
lead_paragraph: A trying season with a deep run has brought out the best and the worst of the Wildcats’ fans, who maintain dozens, and perhaps hundreds, of websites devoted to the team.
snippet: A trying season with a deep run has brought out the best and the worst of the Wildcats’ fans, who maintain dozens, and perhaps hundreds, of websites devoted to the team.
